did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Constituent Correspondence of XXX,

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Governor XXX, Constituent correspondence, 1991. Accession 34589, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 34588 was transferred by XXX, XX.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Original folder titles have been retained.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series I. Cabinet Secretaries and State Agencies, 1991;
